description:
Leonard, a warning: Mom's coming for a visit.Leonard小心：妈妈要来看你了。

"The Good Wife" star Christine Baranski has signed on to return to "The Big Bang Theory" for an early Season 7 episode in her role of Leonard's (Johnny Galecki) socially-challenged genius mother Beverly, TVLine reports.TVLine报道，《傲骨贤妻》女演员Christine Baranski将会回归《生活大爆炸》第七季中的某一集，在剧中她是Leonard的天才老妈Beverly。

While it's unclear what brings Beverly into the fold this time around, TVLine teases that, given her hilarious and bizarre connection to Jim Parsons' Sheldon, fans shouldn't automatically assume it's Lenard she's hoping to see.Baranski上一次出现在这部CBS热门喜剧时是该剧的第五季。目前还没有消息显示，Beverly回来看Leonard的原因是什么。由于她上一次出现和Sheldon有一些奇葩经历，恐怕她的回归不会是Leonard愿意看到的哦。

"The Big Bang Theory" returns for Season 7 with back-to-back new episodes on Thursday, Sept. 26 at 8:00 p.m. ET on CBS. 《生活大爆炸》第七季将会在北京时间9月27日回归。

title: 《生活大爆炸》Leonard老妈又来了
